data.eml:eml: A new ricinuleid of the genus Ricinoides Ewing (Arachnida, Ricinulei) from Ghana

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naskrecki, Piotr (2008): A new ricinuleid of the genus Ricinoides Ewing (Arachnida, Ricinulei) from Ghana. Zootaxa 1698: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274091
